attributes.additional_details:
International Aid
Why don’t we stop all international Aid from April 2013
To March 2014 this should NOT be a political discussion all
Parties should stand together is should NOT be Politically correct
WHAT IT SHOULD BE IS COMMONSENCE
11 billion pounds of our Tax
This could then be used to
 1 Reinforce all of our water ways to stop flooding
 2 Re surface all our roads and road improvement
  3 improver school infrastructure
  While this is in place we should then look at the future  forget about
Our consciences and think about GREAT BRITTEN and the TAX Payer
All race colour and creed MUST stand together
